StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [MCRISS_PERMISSION]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
DECLARE @spname as varchar(100) DECLARE @SQLString as NVARCHAR(100)
DECLARE sproc_Cursor CURSOR FOR select name from sysobjects where name like 'sp%' and xtype = 'P'
OPEN sproc_Cursor
FETCH NEXT FROM sproc_Cursor INTO @spname
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON [dbo].[' + @spname + '] TO [mirs_interface]' EXEC sp_executesql @SQLString
SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON [dbo].[' + @spname + '] TO [mcmods_interface]' EXEC sp_executesql @SQLString
SET @SQLString = 'GRANT EXECUTE ON [dbo].[' + @spname + '] TO [mcriss_operations]' EXEC sp_executesql @SQLString
FETCH NEXT FROM sproc_Cursor INTO @spname END
CLOSE sproc_Cursor DEALLOCATE sproc_Cursor
